author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of Tamil Nadu All Teachers Association launched an agitation at the District Elementary Educational Office here on Monday.

They protested against demoting a Headmistress of Vilathikulam Panchayat Union School to Second Grade Assistant and demanded that the order be revoked immediately. S.C. Gibson, general secretary of the association, who led the stir, said that even after two years, the teachers’ promotion panel had not been released for the school.
title: Teachers stage protest
